testcase.name: Verify incorrect page heading is not displayed
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the email disclaimer page..............................passed When the page is loaded.....................................................passed Then the page heading should not be "Shoprite Holdings Limited Data Protection Notice".passed

testcase.name: Verify clicking a non-existent link does not cause navigation
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the email disclaimer page..............................passed When the user clicks on a non-existent link "Invalid Link"..................passed Then the browser should remain on the Email Disclaimer page.................passed

testcase.name: Verify disclaimer section does not contain irrelevant text
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the email disclaimer page..............................passed When the page is loaded.....................................................passed Then the disclaimer section should not contain "Welcome to our Shopping Portal".passed

testcase.name: Verify Data Privacy Statement link is not broken
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the email disclaimer page..............................passed When the user clicks on the "data privacy statement" link...................passed Then the browser should not navigate to a 404 error page....................passed

testcase.name: Verify footer does not appear blank
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the email disclaimer page..............................passed When the page is loaded.....................................................passed Then the footer text should not be empty....................................passed
